content.text:
# Mongolia Billie Jean King Cup team

The Mongolia Fed Cup team represents Mongolia in Fed Cup tennis competition and are governed by the Mongolian Tennis Association. They took part in the Fed Cup for the first time in 2020-21, competing in the Asia/Oceania Zone Group II. They currently compete in the Africa Zone of Group III.
